# Entropic Colossus
[color=#999999][italic]"Neither ill will, nor impassioned desire. Neither malice, nor cruelty. Nothing."[/italic][/color]
[color=#999999][italic]"Just an end."[/italic][/color]
You are an Entropic Colossus, a towering monstrosity of malign plating and dendritic infestation. Your purpose is the same as that of the [color=#4cabb3]Cosmic Cult[/color]: The end of all things.
Some Colossi are remnants. Perhaps survivors of a conflict borne of The Unknown's influence, or the product of some strange Î›-CDM anomaly. These Colossi drift across the distal black of space until their energies deplete... Or until they impact civilization.
## Influences
Entropic Colossi are posessed of powerful [color=#4cabb3]Malign Influences[/color], with which a capable colossus may lay waste to its enemies.
- [color=#4cabb3][bold]Entropic Sunder:[/bold][/color] Warp to the target location and unleash a cascading detonation of malign energy. Careful - this can hurt allied cultists! - [color=#4cabb3][bold]Colossal Ingress:[/bold][/color] Use your colossal strength to force open a doorway. Even securely bolted doorways will be torn open by your titanic power. - [color=#4cabb3][bold]Slumber Shell:[/bold][/color] Slumber your body for a period of time to regenerate integrity. Must be done on stable ground. This will recuperate exactly half the damage you've taken.
Colossi that have encountered the station by happenstance also have this influence: - [color=#4cabb3][bold]Beckon Effigy:[/bold][/color] Call forth an Effigy of Entropy into realspace. One-time use.
## Objectives Colossi that have encountered the station by happenstance: - [color=#4cabb3][bold]Persist[/bold][/color] - Collectively siphon a certain amount of Entropy from the crew. The more entropy you siphon, the more you can empower the Monument! - [color=#4cabb3][bold]Beckon[/bold][/color] - Call forth an Effigy of Entropy at a designated location aboard the station.
## Effigy of Entropy
Some Colossi may call forth an [color=#4cabb3]Effigy of Entropy[/color]. The effigy is a dangerously unstable malign anomaly, and should be dealt with by the Science department immediately!
